option.value:
Write a python program to implement a fuzzy set assuming the fuzzy set will be in trapezoidal form, using the following steps:
1. Define a class to represent a point (in Euclidean 2-D plain) 2. Using this, define a class to represent a 2D straight line when two points on it are given 3. Write a function to display a straight line 3. Using this, display the two lines - Line1 from (0,4) to (4,0) and Line2 from (0,0) to (4,4) 4. Now, define a class called Fuzzy_set, with 4 given points left_bottom, left_top, right_top and right_bottom 5. Write a function to display the fuzzy set 6. Using this, create and display the fuzzy set fs, whose 4 points are (20,0), (40,1), 50,1) and (70,0) 6. Write a function that takes one fuzzy set as input and returns the complement of this fuzzy set as output 7. Using this, find fsc - the complement of fs and display it 7. Write a function to calculate the membership of a point in a fs 8. Using this calculate and display the membership of the points 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60, 65 and 70 in both fs and fsc

please remove all the comments and add question number and a conside txt
#1.Class to represent a point
